article_title: Why These Three States Might Soon Lower The Legal Drinking Age

article_metadata.description: Here's why New Hampshire, California and Minnesota are considering lowering the drinking age from 21.

og.description: '18 year olds have nearly every burden and privilege of adults...except the right to drink alcohol.'
